Node.definition: marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state of not being subject to change
= the bottom part of a construction, which bears everything built on top of it; sometimes used in a somewhat figurative sense to denote the foundations of heaven and earth

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans or deities express their disapproval of something with words

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which humans provide evidence in court
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
literally: house (of an object); hence: = a place that is associated with a certain class people that live there, or objects that are found there

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) brother of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► first high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= woman; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► elder sister of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן)

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose
= man; ◄ son of Zippor (צִפֹּור) ► king of Moab (מֹואָב) tried to curse and destroy the Israelites on their way to Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Beor (בְּעֹור) from Pethor (פְּתֹור) ► a non Israelite prophet or fortune teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Balaam (בִּלְעָם)
= location; ◄ Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) Valley
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= location; ◄ close to Jericho (יְרִחֹו) ► first camp of Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) after crossing the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) here they set up twelve stones as a monument; it later became the location of a cultic center
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= action of humans or deities that is in accordance with the requirements of the divine law and and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this type of behavior as a standard, which often requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to approach|to come before|to stand before|to confront
Node.definition: = action by which humans place themselves in front of individuals or groups, facing either forward or backward, ► and either with good or with evil intentions; ≈ sometimes used figuratively in situations where humans come before God in worship, or where God confronts enemies, or when certain conditions are personified
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to approach|to come before|to stand before|to confront
Node.definition: = action by which humans place themselves in front of individuals or groups, facing either forward or backward, ► and either with good or with evil intentions; ≈ sometimes used figuratively in situations where humans come before God in worship, or where God confronts enemies, or when certain conditions are personified
= male young of a cow (פָּרָה) ► used as a symbol for a deity; also used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with being willful and untrained
= state in which humans and animals have a certain age, ◄ referred to as a child of a certain number of years
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership
= state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= first offspring of any female; ► in the case of humans, the main heir of estate and blessing
= action by which humans or groups defy an authority or a standard of behavior; by extension, can also refer to the punishment or guilt incurred from a trangression
= offspring of human beings, ◄ literally depicted as the fruit of the womb, as if it were a plant; ≈ regarded as a blessing from God
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities demand (other) humans to perform a certain event
= set of particles marking an object or event as a subset of a larger group which has been singled out from among the rest

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= practices that conform to the laws of God
= affection between people, or between people and deities

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= pattern of actions by which humans acknowledge their human limitations and avoid presumption towards God
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
read ירא (ירא)
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded

literally: staff; hence: = a person with the authority represented by a scepter|literally: stick; hence: = process of causing systematic suffering to someone else ◄ as if one were beating someone else with a stick|= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
literally: to set; hence: = action by which humans make a certain decision regarding something
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= state in which an object or event is present or possible|= action when one is no longer able to remember or recall a person or a past experience

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= valuable goods in one's possession; ≈ falsely considered a source of well being
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)

= causative action by which deities or humans consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= state in which a deity considers a person to be upright and innocent in character and behavior

= contraption consisting of rod held by a cord in the middle and with pans attached to both ends; ► used for weighing objects; sometimes used figuratively in expressions describing people's status or integrity or the seriousness of a situation in terms of weight
= receptacle, ◄ made of leather or cloth, ► used to carry possessions, including money

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to be filled > to be engaged
Node.definition: literally: to be filled (with an activity); hence: = state in which humans are fully engaged in a certain activity, either as victim or as active participant
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: falsehood; hence: = state in which things that are being communicated are factually untrue
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
= the state in which something false is described or spoken about as true, so that others believe it to be truth
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= marker pointing out that the information that follows represents the logical consequence of what has been stated before
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans to lose their physical strength
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled
meaning unsure; possibly: = state in which the human stomach is empty
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= action by which humans scatter seeds or plant young plants in a field so that they may grow into a new crop; ≈ associated with the concept of investing in order to get a return; also associated with reproduction and perpetuation
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= action by which someone move their feet with force on a surface or object, usually in a repetitive way ► which causes an effect on the surface or object whereupon it happens; ≈ associated with aggression and control

= tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; its leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; its fruit is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than 1 cm. thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; ► its fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and for anointing; ≈ regarded as beautiful and associated with well being

Node.gloss: to anoint oneself (with oil)|to rub (oil) on oneself|to groom oneself
Node.definition: = action by which humans pour or rub liquid, usually olive oil, on their body ► to clean and smooth the skin as an act of grooming

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= pattern of behavior required from someone by somebody in authority
= man; ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ahab (אַחְאָב)
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= man; ◄ son of Omri (עָמְרִי) ► king of northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) husband of Jezebel (אִיזֶבֶל) father of Ahaziah (אֲחַזְיָהוּ) and Joram (יְהֹורָם)
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= action by which humans exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= causative action by which humans make an effort to arouse an emotion of shame in (other) humans or deities; ◄ by their words or actions
literally: to hold, carry; hence: = process by which humans undergo certain processes or actions initiated by (other) humans or deities
